inclusion.criterion: Suspected faecal peritonitis originating from the small intestine, colon or rectum
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Contamination in minimum 2 out of 4 abdominal quadrants
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Diffuse peritonitis originating from a different focus than the small intestine, colon or rectum
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has suspected faecal peritonitis originating from the small intestine, colon or rectum. However, there is no clear evidence of diffuse peritonitis originating from a different focus.
